data.title: Essai d'une typologie juive. by PRAAG, SIEGFRIED E. VAN
data.meta_description: Genève, Revue juive de Genève, (1938). 39 pp. Paper yellowing, a few small clean tears. Good copy. Orig. wrappers, damaged. French Judaica. Title translates: Essay on a Jewish typology. Siegfried van Praag was a prolific Jewish - Dutch writer, he published more than 60 books, mainly Dutch fiction. Extremely rare pamphlet. - Essai d'une typologie juive.

Terms of Sale:

Payment accepted by Bank-transfer, Paypal, VISA and MASTERCARD.

Our books are in in good condition, unless otherwise stated. Any item can be

returned for refund within 30 days after receipt. Return shipments are at the

sender¿s risk.

Delivery according to the trade conditions of the Antiquarian Bookseller's

Association of the Netherlands, Amsterdam, depôt-no 212/1982, in which among

other things is determined that the property right of the supplied goods remains

with us up to full payment.

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required. For books under 0,6 KG shipping costs are lower. Our books are always well packed.
